title: User1 Login and Session Creation
description: Verify User1 (user1@gmail.com / test12345) can successfully log in and create a chat session

steps.description: Navigate to /signin page
Enter email: user1@gmail.com
Enter password: test12345
Click Sign in button
Verify user is redirected to /app after successful login
Verify a new chat session is automatically created
Verify User1's email is displayed in the header or user info

title: User2 Login and Session Creation
description: Verify User2 (user2@gmail.com / test12345) can successfully log in and create a chat session

steps.description: Navigate to /signin page (in a new browser context/window)
Enter email: user2@gmail.com
Enter password: test12345
Click Sign in button
Verify user is redirected to /app after successful login
Verify a new chat session is automatically created
Verify User2's email is displayed in the header or user info

title: User1 Creates and Sends Chat Message
description: Verify User1 can create a chat session and send messages

steps.description: Login as User1 (user1@gmail.com / test12345)
Wait for chat interface to load
Type a test message: 'Hello from User1'
Send the message
Verify message appears in the chat history
Verify message is marked as from User1
Verify AI response is received (if applicable)

title: User2 Creates and Sends Chat Message
description: Verify User2 can create a chat session and send messages

steps.description: Login as User2 (user2@gmail.com / test12345) in separate browser context
Wait for chat interface to load
Type a test message: 'Hello from User2'
Send the message
Verify message appears in the chat history
Verify message is marked as from User2
Verify AI response is received (if applicable)

title: User1 Cannot Access User2's Chat Sessions
description: Verify User1 cannot see or access User2's chat sessions

steps.description: Login as User2 and create a chat session with a message
Note the session ID from User2's session
Login as User1 in a separate browser context
Check the chat history sidebar for available sessions
Verify User1's session list does not contain User2's session
Attempt to access User2's session directly via URL or API (if possible)
Verify access is denied or session is not found

title: User2 Cannot Access User1's Chat Sessions
description: Verify User2 cannot see or access User1's chat sessions

steps.description: Login as User1 and create a chat session with a message
Note the session ID from User1's session
Login as User2 in a separate browser context
Check the chat history sidebar for available sessions
Verify User2's session list does not contain User1's session
Attempt to access User1's session directly via URL or API (if possible)
Verify access is denied or session is not found

title: User1's Messages Are Isolated from User2
description: Verify User1's messages are only visible to User1 and not to User2

steps.description: Login as User1 and send a message: 'This is User1's private message'
Login as User2 in a separate browser context
Check User2's chat history
Verify User1's message is NOT visible in User2's chat
Verify User2 only sees their own messages

title: User2's Messages Are Isolated from User1
description: Verify User2's messages are only visible to User2 and not to User1

steps.description: Login as User2 and send a message: 'This is User2's private message'
Login as User1 in a separate browser context
Check User1's chat history
Verify User2's message is NOT visible in User1's chat
Verify User1 only sees their own messages

title: Concurrent Sessions - Both Users Logged In Simultaneously
description: Verify both User1 and User2 can be logged in simultaneously without interference

steps.description: Login as User1 in browser context 1
Login as User2 in browser context 2 (simultaneously)
User1 sends a message: 'Message from User1'
User2 sends a message: 'Message from User2'
Verify User1 only sees their own message
Verify User2 only sees their own message
Verify both users can interact with the app simultaneously without errors

title: User1 Can Create, Read, Update, and Delete Own Sessions
description: Verify User1 has full CRUD operations on their own chat sessions

steps.description: Login as User1
Create a new chat session
Verify new session appears in session list
Open the session and verify it loads correctly
Update session title (if feature exists)
Verify session title is updated
Delete the session
Verify session is removed from session list

title: User2 Can Create, Read, Update, and Delete Own Sessions
description: Verify User2 has full CRUD operations on their own chat sessions

steps.description: Login as User2
Create a new chat session
Verify new session appears in session list
Open the session and verify it loads correctly
Update session title (if feature exists)
Verify session title is updated
Delete the session
Verify session is removed from session list

title: User1 Cannot Modify or Delete User2's Sessions
description: Verify User1 cannot modify or delete sessions belonging to User2

steps.description: Login as User2 and create a session, note the session ID
Login as User1
Attempt to access User2's session (if session ID is known)
Verify User1 cannot see User2's session in their session list
Verify User1 cannot modify User2's session (if direct access attempted)
Verify User1 cannot delete User2's session

title: User2 Cannot Modify or Delete User1's Sessions
description: Verify User2 cannot modify or delete sessions belonging to User1

steps.description: Login as User1 and create a session, note the session ID
Login as User2
Attempt to access User1's session (if session ID is known)
Verify User2 cannot see User1's session in their session list
Verify User2 cannot modify User1's session (if direct access attempted)
Verify User2 cannot delete User1's session

title: Multiple Sessions Per User
description: Verify each user can create and manage multiple chat sessions independently

steps.description: Login as User1
Create Session 1 and send a message
Create Session 2 and send a different message
Create Session 3 and send another message
Verify all three sessions appear in User1's session list
Switch between sessions
Verify each session displays its own message history correctly
Login as User2 and create multiple sessions
Verify User2's sessions are independent from User1's sessions
